item.title: Some problems with commands
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

The error is informing you that the loadUnpackedShops void has a private modifier which means that it can only be accessed within the ShopsHandler class. Just go into the ShopsHandler class and give it public access.

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/javaOO/accesscontrol.html

Read full topic

item.title: Some problems with commands
item.dc:creator: @ttj ttj
item.description:
@ttj wrote:

Recently i’ve started learning about java and tried to code an rsps. I tired to get as minimum help as possible from the net that way i could learn fast and without people spoon-feeding me. Had problems with this at first.

	if (cmd[0].equals("reloadshops") && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Zalo")) {
				ShopsHandler.loadUnpackedShops();
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Zalo reloaded the shops.");
				return true;
		}

Compiled and had a ShopsHandler symbol error which i solved it by randomly looking and codes and figuring where the probem lies which was i didnt import the file into the commands.java

Now a problem which i’m kind of stuck with is this.

Can’t figure out the private access thing. Anyone could help me alittle with it. i’ll be thankful

Read full topic
